Title: Linux
Body: Date: Tue, 14 Jan 1997 19:57:27 GMT Server: NCSA/1.4.1 Content-type: text/html Last-modified: Sat, 28 Sep 1996 22:26:09 GMT Content-length: 873 Linux Linux Description Linux is an extremely popular OS for i386 machines, with ports for m68k Macintosh and Amiga machines, MIPS based machines, and DEC Alphas.
